summary: This is a stipulation filed in the Southern District of New York in November 2021, agreeing that transcripts of Ghislaine Maxwell's depositions from April and July 2016 are true and accurate copies and may be received as evidence at trial. It lists the prosecutors and defense attorneys involved.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

persons.name: Damian Williams

events.title: Deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell was taken in New York, New York. The transcript is stipulated as a true and accurate copy.

events.title: Second Deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A second deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell was taken in New York, New York. The transcript is stipulated as a true and accurate copy.

events.title: Stipulation Filed for Trial
events.description: A stipulation is filed and dated, agreeing that the deposition transcripts are true copies and may be received as evidence at the upcoming trial.

keyFacts: The document is a stipulation agreeing that transcripts of Ghislaine Maxwell's depositions from April 22, 2016, and July 22, 2016, are true and accurate copies.
The stipulation, marked as Government Exhibit 1008, is intended to be received as evidence at trial.
The document lists Damian Williams as the U.S. Attorney and four defense attorneys (Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, Jeffrey Pagliuca, Bobbi Sternheim) representing Ghislaine Maxwell.
The stipulation was filed in November 2021 in the criminal case S2 20 CR 330 (AJN) in the Southern District of New York.
